item.title: You Don't Want To Miss This Holiday-Themed Astro Bot Level
item.content:encoded:
https://kotaku.com/astro-bot-winter-wonderland-christmas-holiday-level-1851721615

Game of the Year winner Astro Bot is one hell of a platformer with plenty of creative and thrilling levels to complete throughout its campaign. And since launch, developer Team ASOBI has continued to release new levels to keep players interested even after completing everything the base game has to offer. Such is the case with the new Winter Wonder level as well, bringing a bit of holiday cheer to the colorful world of Astro Bot.

Suggested Reading

Tears Of The Kingdom's Newspaper Questline And The State Of Hyrulean Journalism

  • Off
  • English

Suggested Reading

The Winter Wonder level is a breezy and laid-back holiday experience for all ages, so you can take your time and relax while collecting presents and taking in all of the snowy sights. However, you’ll need to find the level before you can begin the festivities. So if you’re wondering how to play the Winter Wonder Christmas level, we’ll fill you in below.

How To Play Astro Bot’s ‘Winter Wonder’ Christmas Level

To access Astro Bot’s Winter Wonder level, you’ll first need to be sure you’ve completed the base game. This should take the average player around 8-10 hours, so you’re not too far away from access if you’re new to the game.

Once you’ve completed Astro Bot’s main campaign, head to the main universe hub where you access each of the individual galaxies. Fly around for a bit and you should see a little planet fly around with a Santa hat on its head. You’ll need to chase him down (use R2 for a boost) and hit him.

Once you hit the Santa planet, he’ll spawn the Winter Wonder level on the right side of the level for you. Now, all you need to do is head over there, enter the level, and start having a jolly good time.

Happy Holidays from Kotaku! Sorry, we forgot to get you a present.
